serializer.description: Configuration settings for the test serializer associated with the invoker.

request-topic.description: The MQTT topic pattern for the Command request.

topic-namespace.description: A leading namespace for the Command request and response MQTT topic patterns.

response-topic-prefix.description: A prefix to be prepended to the request topic pattern to produce a response topic pattern.

response-topic-suffix.description: A suffix to be appended to the request topic pattern to produce a response topic pattern.

topic-token-map.description: A map from topic tokens to replacement values.

response-topic-map.description: A map from request topic to response topic, as an alternative to using prefix/suffix.
